Title: Pre-Silicon Bug Forecast
Published: IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON COMPUTER-AIDED DESIGN OF INTEGRATED CIRCUITS AND SYSTEMS
Elements_risk_assessment:
For each modified chunk, by executing blame
command supported by SVN, we identify the bug- introducing revision that brings this buggy code chunk
to the module.
Summary:
a novel framework called pre-silicon bug forecast
to predict the bug information of hardware designs.
Outcome:
about 90% modules
could be correctly predicted as buggy or clean and the number
of bugs of each module could also be accurately predicted.
